item.title: Karen add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Karen add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Karen add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Karen add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Karen add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Karen add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Karen add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "It’s a story of love, of hatred, and of the dreams that live in the shadow of the wind." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Karen add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafon
item.description: "Fools talk, cowards are silent, wise men listen." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafon

item.title: Karen add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "Bea says that the art of reading is slowly dying, that it's an intimate ritual, that a book is a mirror that offers us only what we already carry inside us, that when we read, we do it with all our heart and mind, and great readers are becoming more scarce by the day." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Karen add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "And when her lips met mine, I knew that I could live to be a hundred and visit every country in the world, but nothing would ever compare to that single moment when I first kissed the girl of my dreams and knew that my love would last forever." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Karen add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Karen add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "In nineteen minutes, you can mow the front lawn; color your hair; watch a third of a hockey game. In nineteen minutes, you can bake scones or get a tooth filled by a dentist; you can fold laundry for a family of five. In nineteen minutes, you can stop the world; or you can just jump off it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Karen add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't need water to feel like you're drowning, do you?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Karen add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Life was what happened when all the what-if’s didn’t, when what you dreamed or hoped or – in this case – feared might come to pass passed by instead. " -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Karen add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I am Alice in Wonderland', Josie thought. 'Watch me fall." -- Jodi Picoult
